name: ASMR Universe 2
description: ASMR Universe is back. Now with more sounds and workshop support! Create and share ASMR Soundscapes!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
